text: Sir James Milne Wilson (29 February 1812 â€“ 29 February 1880) was a Scottish- born Australian politician. He served as premier of Tasmania from 1869 to 1872. He was also president of the Tasmanian Legislative Council from 1872 until his death in 1880. Wilson was born in Banff, Scotland. He married Deborah Hope in 1847. In 1880, he died on his 68th birthday in Hobart Town, Tasmania. Wilson was born on 29 February, making him a leapling, and died on the same date. ==References== ==Other websites== *Parliament of Tasmania profile Category:1812 births Category:1880 deaths Category:Knights Commander of the Order of St Michael and St George Category:Premiers of Tasmania
title: James Milne Wilson
